Description: Once per day automatically succeed on a Strength-based check to lift or break something.
You can wield Two-Handed weapons in one hand.
You never suffer exhaustion from travel or lack of sleep (must still rest for HP).
If you would die you instead drop to 1 HP and become immune to damage for 1 round.
You can reroll any 1s rolled on damage or skill checks involving dexterity.
Your Critical Hit range expands by 2 (eg 18-20).
You add your Reflex bonus to your Initiative rolls twice.
Take two full Actions in a single turn (Once per long rest).
Regenerate HP equal to your Vitality bonus every hour.
You stop aging and are immune to all non-magical diseases and poisons.
Gain +1 Max HP for every level you have (retroactive).
Reduce all incoming physical damage by your Fortitude bonus.
You are considered Proficient in all Lore skills even untrained ones.
Once per day ask the GM a specific question about the world; they must answer truthfully.
Analyze an enemy to gain Advantage on all attacks against them for 1 minute.
You can retroactively declare you prepared for this specific situation (have the right item/key).
You cannot be surprised while you are conscious.
See through Invisibility and Illusions out to 60ft.
The GM will warn you if you are about to walk into a lethal trap or impossible fight.
Force any creature (ally or enemy) to reroll a die just rolled.
Merchants buy items for 20% more and sell for 20% less to you.
You can attract a dedicated follower (NPC) who serves you loyally until death.
You have Advantage on all saves against Magic.
You are immune to Mind Control Possession and Fear.
